quotes.quote: Without goals, and plans to reach them, you are like a ship that has set sail with no destination.
A plan relieves you of the torment of choice.
A plan that is not written is just an idea.
Plans are things that change.
A man who does not plan long ahead will find trouble at his door.
A goal without a plan is just a wish.
Create a definite plan for carrying out your desire and begin at once, whether you ready or not, to put this plan into action.
A plan is a list of actions arranged in whatever sequence is thought likely to achieve an objective.
Plans are of little importance, but planning is essential.
Setting a goal is not the main thing. It is deciding how you will go about achieving it and staying with that plan.
If you plan on being anything less than you are capable of being, you will probably be unhappy all the days of your life.
Plans are only good intentions unless they immediately degenerate into hard work.
Planned or unplanned events have a beginning and an end. All you can do is make them better, shorter, or longer.
It takes as much energy to wish as it does to plan.
Make no little plans; they have no magic to stir men's blood. Make big plans, aim high in hope and work.
No plan ever failed due to good planning.
Any idea, plan, or purpose may be placed in the mind through repetition of thought.
To achieve great things, two things are needed; a plan, and not quite enough time.
Failing to plan is planning to fail.
You can have a plan, but you have to be flexible. Every day is unpredictable, and you just have to go with the flow.
Planning is bringing the future into the present so that you can do something about it now.
Plans are worthless. Planning is priceless.
Our goals can only be reached through a vehicle of a plan, in which we must fervently believe, and upon which we must vigorously act. There is no other route to success.
A good plan, violently executed now, is better than a perfect plan next week.
Plan for what it is difficult while it is easy, do what is great while it is small.
Most of us start out with a positive attitude and a plan to do our best.
Life is what happens to us while we are making other plans.
You don't always need a plan. Sometimes you just need to breathe, trust, let go and see what happens.
Plans are invitation to disappointment.
A plan is not putting you in a box and forcing you to stay there. A plan is a guide to keep you on course, efficient, and safe.
